author: Simon Difford
description: Originally named the Unripe Manhattan after the website of its creator, this Manhattan-style cocktail benefits from the spice of rye whiskey with sweet and bianco vermouth and a dash of orange cura√ßao.
name: Maida Vale
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
7.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
